Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth significantly more than its actual cost to us. Given its high quality and unique features, we're confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We're offering this exceptional item to you for $120. This price reflects not only the value we see in the product but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market while ensuring you receive a great deal. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly special. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
